original_text: And when he had spent everything, a severe famine arose in that country, and he began to be in need.
korean_text: 다 없앤 후 그 나라에 크게 흉년이 들어 그가 비로소 궁핍한지라

sentences.original_text: And when he had spent everything,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 것을 다 써 버렸을 때,

sentences.original_text: a severe famine arose in that country,
and he began to be in need.
